title: EcoFlow Wins TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow's GLACIER portable refrigerator has earned the TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award in the Green Energy category for its innovative and eco-friendly design, featuring a detachable plug-in battery that provides clean energy for an extended period, reducing the ecological footprint associated with outdoor activities.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is considered green innovation due to the development of an eco-friendly and sustainable portable refrigerator that uses clean energy sources, aligning with environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. The EcoFlow GLACIER portable refrigerator showcases a new product in the market that significantly differs from previous offerings, highlighting a business innovation.
green_product: TRUE. EcoFlow's GLACIER portable refrigerator qualifies as a green product as it is designed to reduce environmental impact, featuring sustainable production processes, efficient energy consumption, and support for recycling.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not specifically mention a green process but focuses on the eco-friendly features and benefits of the GLACIER portable refrigerator.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 (All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing), 335211 (Electric Housewares and Household Fan Manufacturing), 335222 (Household Refrigerator and Home Freezer Manufacturing), 335312 (Motor and Generator Manufacturing)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not indicate any misleading or false information about the environmental benefits of the GLACIER portable refrigerator, focusing on its genuine eco-friendly features and recognitions.
